name: Ticket Creation Test
description: Test for ticket creation workflow with knowledge base search

parts.text: My account is completely locked and I can't access anything. This is urgent!

I found an article about account management. It suggests going to example.com/account to manage your account settings. Since your account is locked and you can't access it, I can create an urgent support ticket to get this resolved as quickly as possible. Would you like me to do that?

response.data: Go to example.com/account to manage your account settings.
